overview: Jay Bala is a seasoned product visionary with hands-on experience in Analytics and Data Warehousing built over two decades in leadership roles at enterprise companies and startups. Most recently, Jay led the customer success team of a SaaS-based customer behavioral analytics company, Quantivo Corporation, driving successful implementations at Fortune 500 companies like Comcast, Metlife and Party City. Previously Jay spent 8 years at Informatica (Nasdaq: INFA) where he managed a global PM team in building the metadata management product line that grew from 1 to 200+ customers over 3 years. Jay was an early employee of Influence Software (acquired by Informatica), a startup that built packaged analytic applications for SAP customers like Honeywell and Johnson & Johnson. Jay has an MBA from the Indian Institute of Management, Calcutta and a B.Tech in Electrical Engineering from the Indian Institute of Technology, Madras.
